titleStmt.title: Oratio funebris habita in ecclesia Cathedrali Christi Oxon in obitum viri omni ævo dignissimi Gulielmi Goodvvin istius ecclesiæ decani, s. theol. Doctoris. A Tho. Goffe Artium Magistro ex Æde Christi.
titleStmt.author: Goffe, Thomas, 1591-1629.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
